alert.note: Alert for Nash; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 7:58PM EDT until April 28 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Nash County in central North Carolina... Wilson County in central North Carolina... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 757 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bailey, or 18 miles southwest of Nashville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Wilson, Elm City, Bailey, Lucama, Stantonsburg, Black Creek, Saratoga, Sims, Buckhorn Reservoir and Willbanks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
